data.actual_result: The notification setting changes when clicking on it but you can't see the change instantly. You must reopen the settings to see it.
data.expected_result: The change for the notification settings should be instantly shown.
data.short_description: Notification setting changes for servers not instantly shown
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any Discord server - Open the notification settings - Try to change your settings like muting/not muting the server - Observe it
